original_text: But when I hoped for good things to happen, trouble came instead. When I looked for light to shine on me, everything became dark. But when I hoped for good things to happen, trouble came instead. When I looked for light to shine on me, everything became dark. But when I hoped for good things to happen, trouble came instead. When I looked for light to shine on me, everything became dark. But when I hoped for good things to happen,
korean_text: 내가 복을 바랐더니 화가 왔고 광명을 기다렸더니 흑암이 왔구나

sentences.original_text: But when I hoped for good things to happen
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 좋은 일이 일어나기를 바랐을 때
